help.description: Shows list of commands and description of a provided command with syntax

posix.description: Returns current time in POSIX format

uptime.description: Shows current bot uptime in a nice format

roll.description: Rolls a dice! Default - d20. Params: kh{num} - Keep Highest <number> rolls ([amount] should be more than <num>+1), kl{num} - Keep Lowest <number> rolls ([amount] should be more than <num>+1), r{num} - Lowest roll will be <number>, [+|-{num}] - add/subtract modifier <number>

metar.description: Returns current weather information in METAR format

taf.description: Returns current weather forecast in TAF format

ip.description: Returns information about provided IP address or Domain

verse.description: Returns a requested verse from the Bible

uuid.description: Returns a Discord UUID. If empty, returns sender's UUID

tp.description: Teleports a user to other channel

randomtp.description: Teleports a user to a random voice channel

randomtpall.description: Teleports all users to a random voice channel

randompaintp.description: Teleports constantly all users to random voice channels

play.description: Queries YouTube and plays (or adds to the queue) the provided song name or url.

playlist.description: Querries YouTube and plays (or adds to the queue) the provided playlist

loop.description: Loops current song or the entire queue

seek.description: Seeks a song by a provided amount of seconds

queue.description: Shows a list of enqueued tracks

remove.description: Removes a song from the queue
